description: Take a textfile of comma separated stock tickers on one line as input. Using the Python package yfinance, output the corresponding earnings as a Python dictionary with each ticker mapped to the earning.
expected_outputs: {'MMM': 'Have not implemented fetching 'earnings' from Yahoo API', 'MSFT': 'Have not implemented fetching 'earnings' from Yahoo API'}

files.name: tickers.txt
files.description: A file with one line containing comma separated stock tickers
